job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end.
     * Responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems.
     * A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions.
     * Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution.
     * Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution.
     * Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution.

   What's in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become front-runner with the latest (AI) developments.
     * Doing good - contribute in solving one of the key global challenges: the data / privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of snacks, drinks, birthday treats, and social events.
     * Great and easy accessible office location in Amsterdam.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Machine Learning Software Engineer

* Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application (Python, Generative AI models, Ray, FastAPI), that interfaces with the back-end.
     * Responsible for developing and implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models to solve complex problems.
     * A key role in developing our software solution, involved with important technical decisions.
     * Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution.
     * Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution.
     * Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution.

   What's in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become front-runner with the latest (AI) developments.
     * Doing good - contribute in solving one of the key global challenges: the data / privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of snacks, drinks, birthday treats, and social events.
     * Great and easy accessible office location in Amsterdam.

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes building and implementing machine learning algorithms and models, improving and benchmarking functionalities, and making key technical decisions for a software solution. While Generative AI is mentioned, the core focus appears to be on the broader ML engineering aspects of developing and productionizing models within a software application.

phrases: implementing cutting-edge machine learning algorithms and models
Generative AI models
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the creation, training, and adaptation of machine learning and generative AI models, which is the core of the Modeling task.

phrases: Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application
FastAPI
interfaces with the back-end
developing our software solution
Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities of our software solution
Identify and implement new features for improving our software solution
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate the development of a core application, integration with back-end systems, and the implementation of new features, all falling under traditional software engineering for application development.

phrases: scalable Syntho Engine Core Application
Ray
job_tasks.justification: Building a 'scalable' application and using a distributed computing framework like 'Ray' suggests a focus on productionizing and managing the performance of the ML system, which aligns with MLOps principles.

phrases: solve complex problems
involved with important technical decisions
Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution
contribute in solving one of the key global challenges: the data / privacy dilemma
job_tasks.justification: These phrases highlight the need to understand the problem domain, contribute to strategic technical direction, and align development with broader goals, including solving global challenges.

phrases: solve complex problems
involved with important technical decisions
Improve, extend and benchmark key functionalities
Identify and implement new features
soft_skills.justification: The role requires tackling complex issues, making critical decisions, and iteratively improving the software, indicating a strong need for problem-solving and a pragmatic approach.

phrases: Build a scalable Syntho Engine Core Application
involved with important technical decisions
Actively participate in technical strategy sessions
freedom to turn your ambition into reality
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on building core applications, making strategic decisions, and having the freedom to act suggests a need for initiative, ownership, and an entrepreneurial spirit.

phrases: Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become front-runner with the latest (AI) developments
soft_skills.justification: The explicit mention of working with cutting-edge technologies and staying at the forefront of AI developments points to the importance of continuous learning and adaptability.

phrases: contribute in solving one of the key global challenges: the data / privacy dilemma
soft_skills.justification: The focus on addressing the data/privacy dilemma highlights an awareness and responsibility towards ethical considerations in AI development.

phrases: Actively participate in technical strategy sessions with respect to the development of our solution
Working with a young & ambitious team
soft_skills.justification: Participation in strategy sessions and working within a team environment implies the need for effective communication and collaboration.
